meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ashley Alley Alex Schraff Michael Brady Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7053.

td.p: Ashley Alley, an attorney from Alexandria, Virginia
Alex Schraff, a management consultant from Coral Springs, Florida
Michael Brady, a user experience designer from Norwood, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,601)

tr.td: (Alex Trebek: You have to name the earlier show.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'This master of the techno-thriller was born in Baltimore in 1947 & died there in 2013')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: This master of the techno-thriller was born in Baltimore in 1947 & died there in 2013

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_5_1', 'clue_J_5_1_stuck', '(Ashley: Uh, who is Carson?)
(Alex Trebek: Be more specific.)
(Ashley: Uh... who\'s...)
(Alex Trebek: Oh, Alex or Michael? Alex?)
(Alex Schraff: What is Carson City?)
(Alex Trebek: No. We\'re going for the man, [beep] and the man is [*].)

Kit Carson

AlexAshley
Triple Stumper
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex Trebek: If you travel to New York City, you can visit the place and read the poem.)
...
[Michael was incorrectly announced as having a 2-day total of $33,601 instead of $33,602.]
AshleyWhat is the Rime of the Ancien
$3,000
AlexWhat is Colossus?
$799
MichaelWhat is The New Colossus
$1
\"The New Colossus\"')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'This 1883 poem says, "Here at our sea-washed, sunset gates shall stand a mighty woman..."')

tr.td: This 1883 poem says, "Here at our sea-washed, sunset gates shall stand a mighty woman..."

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
